resources.string:
"Orbs POS Wallet for Mobile - Terms of Use
Last Revised: January 31, 2020
Orbs Ltd. (“Orbs”, “we”, “our”) welcomes you (“User(s)” or “you”) to the Beta version of the My Orbs Wallet service (the “App”). You may use the App in accordance with the terms and conditions set forth herein.
1. Acceptance of the Terms
By downloading, entering, connecting to, accessing or using the App, and/or by installing and/or providing permission to the App through your device or account, you acknowledge that you have read and understood the following terms of use and you agree to be bound by them and to comply with all applicable laws and regulations regarding your use of the App and you acknowledge that these Terms constitute a binding and enforceable legal contract between Orbs and you. IF YOU DO NOT AGREE TO THESE TERMS, PLEASE DO NOT ENTER, CONNECT TO, ACCESS OR USE THE APP IN ANY MANNER, DO NOT INSTALL OR PROVIDE PERMISSIONS WITH RESPECT TO THE APP AND/OR PROMPTLY UNINSTALL THE APP AND/OR PROMPTLY REMOVE THE APP PERMISSIONS FROM YOUR ACCOUNT AND DEVICE. The App is available only to individuals who (a) are at least eighteen (18) years old (see Section 22 below); and (b) possess the legal authority to enter into these Terms and to form a binding agreement under any applicable law.
2. The App
The App is a Beta version of a non-custodial application designed by Orbs that can be used to manage your holdings of ORBS blockchain tokens (the “Orbs Tokens”) that are usable on the Orbs blockchain network, a next-generation blockchain infrastructure (the “Orbs Network”), and to participate in the Orbs Universe proof-of-stake ecosystem, which allows holders of Orbs Tokens to participate in the operation, security and governance of the Orbs Network by staking or delegating Orbs Tokens (the “Orbs Proof-of-Stake Universe”). More information about the Orbs Proof-of-Stake Ecosystem is available here: https://www.orbs.com/orbs-universe/. The App may enable Users to access the following services (collectively, the “Services”): 2.1. To transfer information and content between the Users and blockchain infrastructure provided by the Orbs Network or the Ethereum blockchain, as applicable; 2.2. To open and maintain a personal non-custodial wallet (“Orbs POS Wallet for Mobile”) that will be associated with such User’s Underlying Account with the Samsung Blockchain Infrastructure or Ledger HW wallet or Ledger hardware wallet(such terms as defined below); 2.3. Through the Orbs POS Wallet for Mobile, facilitate storage and monitoring of Orbs Tokens by Users; 2.4. Through the Orbs POS Wallet for Mobile, participate in the Orbs Proof-of-Stake Ecosystem by staking or delegating tokens; or 2.5. Use such other services made available by Orbs through the App from time to time. The App and any website hosting, or used to access, the App may also provide information regarding Orbs, including content, contact information, videos, text, logos, button icons, images, data compilations, links, other specialized content, documentation, data, related graphics, and other features obtained from or through the App (collectively, the “Content”).
3. Account Registration
In order to use the App, you must download the App to your device. By downloading the App, you provide the App with applicable permissions to read certain information and take certain actions on your device, your account with the associated Google Play Store, Samsung Galaxy Store and the Samsung Blockchain Keystore, which may in turn interact with the Samsung Blockchain Wallet (collectively, the “Samsung Blockchain Infrastructure or Ledger HW wallet”) or Ledger HW Wallet (the “Underlying Accounts”). The App is connected to, derives information from and allows you to engage in certain activities within, your Underlying Accounts, which are password protected. In order to protect the security of your Underlying Account and the personal information used by the App to the greatest extent possible, you must safeguard and not disclose the log-in details of your Underlying Accounts and must supervise the use of such Underlying Accounts. You are fully and solely responsible for the security of your Underlying Accounts and all activity on your Underlying Accounts and on the App, even if such activities were not committed by you. Your Underlying Accounts are essential for utilizing the App, and your loss of your device or the password or other credentials needed to access your Underlying Accounts may cause you to be unable to access the App. Use of the App via your device or your Underlying Accounts by any person will enable such person to use the App to interact with your underlying Accounts and take unauthorized actions therein. Orbs hereby reserves the right, at its sole discretion, to restrict any User from using the App at any time, for any reason, including but not limited to claims by a third party that actions taken by such User violates certain rights of such third parties. If you wish to remove the App, you can uninstall the App from your device. From that date you will no longer be able to utilize the App (see further details with respect thereto in the Privacy Policy, as defined below). DELETING THE APP MAY CAUSE THE LOSS OF ANY ORBS TOKEN HELD IN YOUR ORBS POS WALLET FOR MOBILE AND MAY CAUSE THE LOSS OF CERTAIN INFORMATION YOU PROVIDED US AND/OR THE CAPACITY OF YOUR ACCOUNT. WE DO NOT ACCEPT ANY LIABILITY FOR SUCH LOSS.
4. Orbs POS Wallet for Mobile
The App connects to the Ethereum blockchain, where Orbs Tokens reside, through the Samsung Blockchain Infrastructure or Ledger HW wallet. The Samsung Blockchain Infrastructure or Ledger HW wallet allows you to purchase, store, and engage in transactions using Ethereum cryptocurrency and other blockchain tokens based on the Ethereum protocol and other blockchain protocols, including the Orbs Tokens. You will not be able to engage in any activity in the Orbs POS Wallet for Mobile other than through the Samsung Blockchain Infrastructure or Ledger HW wallet and Ledger HW wallet. The Orbs POS Wallet for Mobile will only recognize you as a user and you will only be able to interact with the Orbs POS Wallet for Mobile if the Samsung Blockchain Infrastructure or Ledger HW wallet is connected to your device and unlocked. There is no other way to sign up or to interact directly with the Orbs POS Wallet for Mobile. Public Nature of Transactions: Transactions that take place through the Orbs POS Wallet for Mobile are ultimately managed and confirmed via the Ethereum blockchain. You understand that your Ethereum public address will be made publicly visible whenever you engage in a transaction through the Orbs POS Wallet for Mobile. Non-Custodial Wallet: The Orbs POS Wallet for Mobile is not a "web wallet". You do not create an account or give us your funds to hold onto. No data leaves your computer, your device or your browser. At no point will Orbs ever take custody of Orbs Tokens through the Orbs POS Wallet for Mobile. We make it easy for you to create, save, and access your information and interact with the Orbs Network and the Orbs Proof-of-Stake Ecosystem. You acknowledge that Orbs is not responsible for transferring, safeguarding, or maintaining your private keys or any digital currency associated therewith. If you lose or mishandle associated digital currency private keys, or if such digital currency private keys are stolen from you, you acknowledge that you may not be able to recover associated digital currency, and that Orbs is not responsible for such loss. You acknowledge that Orbs is not responsible for any loss, damage or liability arising from your failure to comply with the terms hereunder. The Orbs POS Wallet for Mobile software allows you to stake or delegate Orbs Tokens via the Ethereum blockchain and the Orbs Network by utilizing information, such as SeedHash and your wallet address information, that is generated by the Samsung Blockchain Infrastructure or Ledger HW wallet based on cryptographic private and public key pairs that are associated with and stored within your Samsung Blockchain Infrastructure or Ledger HW wallet account. YOU MUST STORE, OUTSIDE OF THE SERVICES, A BACKUP OF ALL SUCH CREDENTIALS, INCLUDING YOUR PASSPHRASES, IDENTIFIERS, BACKUP PHRASES, PRIVATE KEYS AND NETWORK ADDRESSES. If you do not maintain a backup of your data that is held outside of the Orbs POS Wallet for Mobile, you may not be able to access Orbs Tokens previously accessed using your Orbs POS Wallet for Mobile in the event that we discontinue or no longer offer some or all of the services provided through the Orbs POS Wallet for Mobile or may otherwise lose access to Orbs Tokens. We are not responsible for maintaining this data on your behalf. YOUR PRIVATE KEYS WILL REMAIN IN YOUR POSSESSION AND THEIR SECURITY IS YOUR RESPONSIBILITY ? ALWAYS BACKUP YOUR KEYS. Dependence on Third Party Applications: The Orbs POS Wallet for Mobile connects to the Samsung Blockchain Infrastructure or Ledger HW wallet, which provides a platform for managing accounts on the Ethereum blockchain, through a website and browser plugin. By connecting through the Samsung Blockchain Infrastructure or Ledger HW wallet, the Orbs POS Wallet for Mobile is able to effectuate staking, delegation to Guardians and other actions with respect to your Orbs Tokens. If you do not log on to the Orbs POS Wallet for Mobile with the correct device and/or if the device does not have the Samsung Blockchain Infrastructure or Ledger HW wallet installed or activated, you will be recognized by the Orbs POS Wallet for Mobile and you will not be able to interact with the Orbs POS Wallet for Mobile in any way. The Samsung Blockchain Infrastructure or Ledger HW wallet is a third party application that is not under the control of Orbs. Orbs does not own and does not control Samsung or any of the following third-party products used for the function of the Orbs POS Wallet for Mobile: the Samsung Blockchain Infrastructure or Ledger HW wallet, the Ethereum blockchain or any other third-party site, product, service or infrastructure that you may choose to access, visit, or use for the purpose of interacting with or using the Orbs POS Wallet for Mobile. Accordingly, by using the Orbs POS Wallet for Mobile, you acknowledge that Orbs has no control over, and no duty to take any action regarding, any transaction engaged in through the Samsung Blockchain Infrastructure or Ledger HW wallet’s, or any other third party’s, functionality. Orbs will not be held liable, and are not liable, for the acts or omissions by Samsung or any other third party, nor are we liable, or will we be held liable, for any damage that you may suffer as a result of interacting with or using any of the mentioned or unmentioned third parties. You are solely responsible for the safety and security of your Samsung Blockchain Infrastructure or Ledger HW wallet and/or any other service you utilize to interact with the Orbs POS Wallet for Mobile or the Orbs Network. You should review the terms of use and privacy policy of the Samsung Blockchain Infrastructure and Ledger HW wallet, which can be viewed on your device explorer at: [Samsung Blockchain Wallet - Settings - Samsung Block Keystore - About Blockchain Keystore - Terms and Conditions] and [Samsung Blockchain Wallet - Settings - Samsung Block Keystore - About Blockchain Keystore - Privacy Policy] and https://shop.ledger.com/pages/privacy-policy, respectively. You are solely responsible for the safety and security of your use of the Orbs POS Wallet for Mobile. Risk Disclosures Relating to the Orbs POS Mobile Wallet. By utilizing the Services or interacting with the Orbs POS Wallet for Mobile, the Orbs Network or the Orbs Proof-of-Stake Ecosystem in any way, you represent that you understand the inherent risks associated with cryptographic systems; and warrant that you have an understanding of the usage and intricacies of native cryptographic tokens, like the Orbs Tokens, Ether (ETH) and Bitcoin (BTC), smart contract based tokens such as those that follow the Ethereum Token Standard, and blockchain-based software systems, including, but not limited to, the following risks:
A. In order to be completed, any transaction created with the Orbs POS Wallet for Mobile, which may include, without limitation, a delegation or staking of Orbs Tokens or any other form of participation in the Orbs Proof-of-Stake Ecosystem, must be confirmed and recorded on the Ethereum blockchain and the Orbs Network. Such networks are decentralized, peer-to-peer networks operated by independent third parties, which are not owned, controlled or operated by Orbs. B. Orbs does not control the actions of Guardians and Validators on the Orbs Network or nodes on the Ethereum blockchain and therefore cannot and does not ensure that any transaction details you submit via the Orbs POS Wallet for Mobile will be confirmed on the relevant networks. The transaction details you submit via the Orbs POS Wallet for Mobile may not be completed, or may be substantially delayed, by one or both of the applicable networks used to process the transaction. We do not guarantee that the Orbs POS Wallet for Mobile can transfer title or right in the Orbs Tokens or make any warranties whatsoever with regard to title. C. Once transaction details have been submitted via the Orbs POS Wallet for Mobile, we cannot assist you to cancel or otherwise modify your transaction or transaction details.
No Password Retrieval. With respect to the Orbs POS Wallet for Mobile, Orbs does not receive or store any password connected to the Orbs POS Wallet for Mobile, nor any keys, network addresses or transaction history. We cannot assist you with the retrieval of any password or credentials you need to utilize the Orbs POS Wallet for Mobile. You are solely responsible for remembering, storing and keeping secret your passwords, private keys or any other credentials. Any Orbs Tokens you have associated with the Orbs POS Wallet for Mobile may become inaccessible if you do not know or keep secret your password or other credentials associated with the underlying Samsung Blockchain Infrastructure or Ledger HW wallet, or if your device is lost or compromised. Any third party with knowledge of one or more of your credentials (including, without limitation, a backup phrase, wallet identifier or password) or access to your device can potentially engage in unauthorized transactions in Orbs Tokens in your wallet. When you create any blockchain wallet with the Samsung Blockchain Infrastructure or Ledger HW wallet, which will connect to the Orbs POS Wallet for Mobile, you must: (a) create a strong password that you do not use for any other website or online service; (b) provide accurate and truthful information; (c) protect and keep secret all credentials for the wallet; (d) protect access to your device and your wallet; (e) promptly notify Samsung if you discover or otherwise suspect any security breaches related to your wallet; and (f) use any backup functionality provided through the wallet and safeguard your backup files. You agree to take responsibility for all activities that occur with your wallet and accept all risks of any authorized or unauthorized access to your wallet, to the maximum extent permitted by law. Fees. Orbs does not currently charge a fee for the Orbs POS Wallet for Mobile or transactions conducted therein. However, we reserve the right to do so in the future, and in such case shall display to you any applicable fees prior to you incurring the fee. Network fees (including, without limitation “miner’s fees”) required to use the Orbs Network or the Ethereum blockchain may apply to a transaction. We may attempt to calculate such a fee for you. Our calculation may not be sufficient, or it may be excessive. You may select a greater or lesser fee. You are solely responsible for selecting and paying any such fee and Orbs shall neither advance nor fund such a fee on your behalf, nor be responsible for any excess or insufficient fee calculation. Be safe & secure: If you elect to utilize the Orbs POS Wallet for Mobile or otherwise hold any Orbs Tokens, we highly recommend that you educate yourself on blockchain industry standard recommendations on how to be proactive about your security. We are not responsible for any loss: The Orbs Network, the Orbs Token, the Ethereum blockchain and the Samsung Blockchain Infrastructure or Ledger HW wallet are still under active development and as such, (a) may contain bugs, errors and defects, (b) may function improperly or be subject to periods of downtime and unavailability, (c) may result in total or partial loss or corruption of data and (d) may be modified at any time, including through the release of subsequent versions, all with or without notice to you. While we have thoroughly tested the Orbs POS Wallet for Mobile, there is always the possibility something unexpected happens that causes your Orbs Tokens to be lost. Please do not spend more to purchase Orbs Tokens than you are willing to lose, and please be careful."

" 15. Misconduct and Copyright Agent
We care for your safety. If you believe a User acted inappropriately including (but not limited to) offensive, violent or sexually inappropriate behavior, please report immediately such person to the appropriate authorities and to our misconduct agent at [hello@orbs.com]. Orbs may at its sole discretion take any action including but not limited to blocking such User. Orbs respects the intellectual property rights of others. If you believe that your work has been registered to the App or copied in a way that constitutes copyright infringement, please provide the following information in writing to Orbs’ copyright agent: (i) a physical or electronic signature of a person authorized to act on behalf of the owner of the copyright; (ii) a description of the copyrighted work that you claim has been infringed; (iii) a description of the material that you claim to be infringing or to be the subject of infringing activity and that is to be removed or access to which is to be disabled, and information sufficient to permit Orbs to locate the material; (iv) information so that Orbs can contact you, such as address, telephone number and e-mail address; (v) a statement that you believe in good faith that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law; and (vi) a statement that the information in the notification is accurate and, under penalty of perjury, that you are the copyright owner or are authorized to act on behalf of the owner of a copyright that is allegedly infringed. Orbs’ copyright agent can be reached [hello@orbs.com] Orbs has the sole discretion to restrict and/or terminate access to the App to Users who are deemed to be repeat infringers of third party's copyright works or Users who acted inappropriately as specified above.
16. Third Party Components and Licenses
The App may use or include third party software, files and components that are subject to open source and third party license terms, such as Samsung or another Platform Provider, including, but not limited to, the Samsung Blockchain Infrastructure or Ledger HW wallet (collectively, “Third Party Components”). The Samsung Blockchain Infrastructure or Ledger HW wallet may in turn incorporate additional Third Party Components. Your right to use such Third Party Components as part of, or in connection with, the App is subject to any applicable acknowledgements and license terms accompanying such Third Party Components, contained therein or related thereto. If there is a conflict between the licensing terms of such Third Party Components and these Terms, the licensing terms of the Third Party Components shall prevail in connection with the related Third Party Components. All Third Party Components are copyrighted by their respective authors. Such Third Party Components are provided on an “AS IS” basis without any warranty of any kind and shall be subject to any and all limitations and conditions required by such third parties. Under no circumstances shall the App or any portion thereof (except for the Third Party Components contained therein) be deemed to be “open source” or “publicly available” software. Any Third Party Components licensed under open source licenses which may be linked to, interacted with, or used in connection with the App are done so pursuant to each individual open source component license and subject to the disclaimers and limitations on liability set forth in each open source component license. As the App, as currently provided, is a Beta version, it is possible that additional Third Party Components may be incorporated that are not being used in the App on the date hereof. For the avoidance of doubt, the foregoing provisions shall applicable to all such Third Party Components.
17. Disclaimer of Warranties
TO THE FULLEST EXTENT LEGALLY PERMISSIBLE, THE APP AND SERVICES, INCLUDING WITHOUT LIMITATION ANY CONTENT, DATA AND INFORMATION, ARE PROVIDED ON AN “AS IS” , “WITH ALL FAULTS” AND “AS AVAILABLE” BASIS, AND ORBS, INCLUDING ITS VENDORS, OFFICERS, DIRECTORS, EMPLOYEES, AFFILIATES, SUBSIDIARIES, LICENSORS, AGENTS AND SUPPLIERS (“ORBS REPRESENTATIVES”) DISCLAIM ALL WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO WARRANTIES OF TITLE OR NON-INFRINGEMENT OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF USE, MERCHANTABILITY OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. THE APP AND OR THE SERVICE IS INTENDED FOR INFORMATIONAL PURPOSES ONLY. WE DO NOT WARRANT (I) THAT THE APP OR THE SERVICE IS OR WILL BE SECURE, TIMELY, ACCURATE, COMPLETE, UNINTERRUPTED, WITHOUT ERRORS, OR FREE OF VIRUSES, DEFECTS, WORMS, OTHER HARMFUL COMPONENTS OR OTHER PROGRAM LIMITATIONS, (II) THAT THE APP AND/OR THE SERVICE WILL OPERATE AND/OR BE AVAILABLE AT ALL TIMES WITHOUT DISRUPTION OR INTERRUPTION, (III) THAT ORBS WILL CORRECT ANY ERRORS OR DEFECTS IN THE APP AND/OR THE SERVICE, (IV) AND/OR MAKE ANY REPRESENTATION REGARDING THE USE, INABILITY TO USE OR OPERATE, OR THE RESULTS OF THE USE OF THE APP AND/OR THE SERVICE AND/OR CONTENT AVAILABLE THEREON OR THROUGH THE APP AND/OR THE SERVICE (INCLUDING THAT THE RESULTS OF USING THE APP AND/OR THE SERVICE WILL MEET YOUR REQUIREMENTS). ORBS HEREBY DISCLAIMS ALL WARRANTIES AND CONDITIONS WITH REGARD TO THE USE OF THE APP AND/OR THE SERVICES AND/OR USER GENERATED CONTENT, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE AVAILABILITY, RELIABILITY OR THE QUALITY OF THE APP AND/OR THE SERVICE, AND IS NOT AND SHALL NOT BE RESPONSIBLE FOR ANY ERROR, FAULT OR MISTAKE RELATED TO ANY CONTENT AND INFORMATION AND/OR USER GENERATED CONTENT DISPLAYED WITHIN THE APP. WE ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE AND HAVE NO LIABILITY FOR ANY ITEM OR SERVICE PROVIDED BY ANY PERSON OR ENTITY OTHER THAN ORBS. WE ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR ANY CONSEQUENCES TO YOU OR OTHERS THAT MAY RESULT FROM TECHNICAL PROBLEMS (INCLUDING WITHOUT LIMITATION IN CONNECTION WITH THE INTERNET SUCH AS SLOW CONNECTIONS, TRAFFIC CONGESTION, OVERLOAD OF SERVERS, DELAYS OR INTERRUPTIONS) OR ANY TELECOMMUNICATIONS OR INTERNET PROVIDERS. YOU ACKNOWLEDGE AND AGREE THAT THE APP IS A BETA VERSION OF AN ARCHITECTURE THAT UTILIZES NEWLY DEVELOPED BLOCKCHAIN TECHNOLOGY AND IS SUBJECT TO SIGNIFICANT RISKS ASSOCIATED WITH SUCH TECHNOLOGY AND WITH BETA APPLICATIONS IN GENERAL. YOU AGREE THAT USE OF THE APP, THE SERVICES, THE USER GENERATED CONTENT AND/OR THE CONTENT IS ENTIRELY AT YOUR OWN RISK. WITHOUT LIMITING THE GENERALITY OF ANY OTHER PROVISION OF THE TERMS, YOU ACKNOWLEDGE AND AGREE THAT YOU ASSUME FULL RESPONSIBILITY FOR YOUR USE OF THE APP AND THE ORBS POS WALLET FOR MOBILE. YOU ACKNOWLEDGE AND AGREE THAT ANY INFORMATION YOU SEND OR RECEIVE DURING YOUR USE OF THE APP, THE ORBS NETWORK AND THE ORBS POS WALLET FOR MOBILE MAY NOT BE SECURE AND MAY BE INTERCEPTED OR LATER ACQUIRED BY UNAUTHORIZED PARTIES. YOU ACKNOWLEDGE AND AGREE THAT YOUR USE OF THE APP, THE ORBS NETWORK AND THE ORBS POS WALLET FOR MOBILE IS AT YOUR OWN RISK. RECOGNIZING SUCH, YOU UNDERSTAND AND AGREE THAT, TO THE FULLEST EXTENT PERMITTED BY APPLICABLE LAW, NEITHER ORBS NOR ITS SUPPLIERS OR LICENSORS WILL BE LIABLE TO YOU FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, PUNITIVE, EXEMPLARY OR OTHER DAMAGES OF ANY KIND, INCLUDING WITHOUT LIMITATION DAMAGES FOR LOSS OF PROFITS, GOODWILL, USE, DATA OR OTHER TANGIBLE OR INTANGIBLE LOSSES OR ANY OTHER DAMAGES BASED ON CONTRACT, TORT, STRICT LIABILITY OR ANY OTHER THEORY (EVEN IF ORBS HAD BEEN ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES), RESULTING FROM THE APP OR ANY SERVICE; THE USE OR THE INABILITY TO USE THE APP OR THE SERVICE; UNAUTHORIZED ACCESS TO OR ALTERATION OF YOUR TRANSMISSIONS OR DATA; STATEMENTS OR CONDUCT OF ANY THIRD PARTY ON THE APP OR THE SERVICE; ANY ACTIONS WE TAKE OR FAIL TO TAKE AS A RESULT OF COMMUNICATIONS YOU SEND TO US; HUMAN ERRORS; TECHNICAL MALFUNCTIONS; FAILURES, INCLUDING PUBLIC UTILITY OR TELEPHONE OUTAGES; OMISSIONS, INTERRUPTIONS, LATENCY, DELETIONS OR DEFECTS OF ANY DEVICE OR NETWORK, PROVIDERS, OR SOFTWARE (INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THOSE THAT DO NOT PERMIT PARTICIPATION IN THE SERVICE); ANY INJURY OR DAMAGE TO COMPUTER EQUIPMENT; INABILITY TO FULLY ACCESS THE APP OR THE SERVICE OR ANY OTHER WEBSITE; THEFT, TAMPERING, DESTRUCTION, OR UNAUTHORIZED ACCESS TO CONTENT OF ANY KIND; DATA THAT IS PROCESSED LATE OR INCORRECTLY OR IS INCOMPLETE OR LOST; TYPOGRAPHICAL, PRINTING OR OTHER ERRORS, OR ANY COMBINATION THEREOF; OR ANY OTHER MATTER RELATING TO THE APP OR THE SERVICE. INASMUCH AS SOME JURISDICTIONS DO NOT ALLOW THE EXCLUSIONS OR LIMITATIONS AS SET FORTH HEREIN, THE FULL EXTENT OF THE ABOVE EXCLUSIONS AND LIMITATIONS MAY NOT APPLY.
18. Limitation of Liability
TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT LEGALLY PERMISSIBLE, IN NO EVENT SHALL ORBS, INCLUDING ORBS REPRESENTATIVES, BE LIABLE FOR ANY DAMAGES WHATSOEVER, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, DIRECT, INDIRECT, SPECIAL, PUNITIVE, EXEMPLARY, INCIDENTAL OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES OF ANY KIND, UNDER ANY LEGAL THEORY (INCLUDING, WITHOUT LIMITATION, CONTRACT, NEGLIGENCE, TORT OR STRICT LIABILITY) (INCLUDING WITHOUT LIMITATION, LOSS OF GOODWILL, PROFITS OR DATA AND BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) ARISING HEREUNDER, RESULTING FROM OR ARISING OUT OF THE APP AND/OR THE SERVICES AND/OR THE CONTENT AND/OR USER GENERATED CONTENT, YOUR USE OR INABILITY TO USE THE APP AND/OR THE SERVICES AND/OR THE CONTENT AND/OR THE FAILURE OF THE APP TO PERFORM AS DESCRIBED OR EXPECTED, OR FROM THE PERFORMANCE OR FAILURE OF ORBS TO PERFORM UNDER THESE TERMS, ANY OTHER ACT OR OMISSION OF ORBS BY ANY OTHER CAUSE WHATSOEVER; OR BASED UPON BREACH OF WARRANTY, GUARANTEE OR CONDITION, BREACH OF CONTRACT, NEGLIGENCE, STRICT LIABILITY, TORT, OR ANY OTHER LEGAL THEORY, REGARDLESS OF WHETHER ORBS HAS BEEN ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES. IN ANY CASE, WITHOUT LIMITING THE GENERALITY OF THE FOREGOING AND TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT LEGALLY PERMISSIBLE, ORBS’ TOTAL AGGREGATE LIABILITY FOR ALL DAMAGES OR LOSSES WHATSOEVER ARISING HEREUNDER OR IN CONNECTION WITH YOUR USE OR INABILITY TO USE THE APP AND/OR THE SERVICE OR THE CONTENT SHALL BE LIMITED TO THE AMOUNT ACTUALLY PAID BY YOU, IF ANY, TO ORBS FOR USE OF THE APP AND/OR SERVICE OR $US10.00, WHICHEVER IS GREATER. INASMUCH AS SOME JURISDICTIONS DO NOT ALLOW THE EXCLUSIONS OR LIMITATIONS AS SET FORTH HEREIN, THE FULL EXTENT OF THE ABOVE EXCLUSIONS AND LIMITATIONS MAY NOT APPLY.
19. Indemnification
You agree to defend, indemnify and hold harmless Orbs, including the Orbs Representatives, from and against any and all claims, damages, obligations, losses, liabilities, costs, debts, and expenses (including but not limited to attorney's fees) arising from: (i) your use, misuse of, inability to use and/or activities in connection with the App, Services and/or Content; (ii) your violation of any of these Terms; (iii) your violation of any third party rights, including without limitation any intellectual property rights or privacy right of such third party with respect to your use of the App; (iv) any damage of any sort, whether direct, indirect, special or consequential, you may cause to any third party with relation to the App, and/or the Content; (v) the User Generated Content you uploaded to the App; and/or (vi) Orbs’ registration, publication, distribution or use of such User Generated Content you uploaded to the App. It is hereby clarified that this defense and indemnification obligation will survive these Terms.
Without derogating from the foregoing, we reserve the right to assume the exclusive defense and control of any matter which is subject to indemnification by you, which will not excuse your indemnity obligations hereunder and in which event you will fully cooperate with us in asserting any available defense. You agree not to settle any matter subject to an indemnification by you without first obtaining our prior express written approval.
20. Amendments to the Terms
Orbs may, at its sole discretion, change the Terms from time to time, including any other policies incorporated thereto, so please re-visit this page frequently. Without limiting the generality of the foregoing, due to the nature of the App, which is currently being provided in a Beta version, such changes may occur in connection with changes or updates to the App. In case of any material change, we will make reasonable efforts to post a clear notice on the introductory page of the App on the Samsung Galaxy Store regarding such change. Such material changes will take effect seven (7) days after such notice was provided. Otherwise, all other changes to these Terms are effective as of the stated “Last Revised” date and your continued use of the App on or after the Last Revised date will constitute acceptance of, and agreement to be bound by, those changes. In the event that the Terms should be amended to comply with any legal requirements, the amendments may take effect immediately, or as required by the law and without any prior notice.
21. Termination of the App's Operation
At any time, Orbs may discontinue your use of the App in its sole discretion with or without any reason or prior notice, in addition to any other remedies that may be available to Orbs under any applicable law. Additionally, Orbs may at any time, at its sole discretion, cease the operation of the App or any part thereof, temporarily or permanently, without giving any prior notice. You agree and acknowledge that Orbs does not assume any responsibility with respect to, or in connection with the termination of the App's operation and loss of any data. The provisions of these Terms that, by their nature and content, must survive the termination of these Terms in order to achieve the fundamental purposes of these Terms shall so survive. Without limiting the generality of the forgoing, the Intellectual Property, Disclaimers of Warranties, Limitation of Liability, Indemnification and General sections will survive the termination of the Terms.
22. Minors
To use the App you must be over the age of eighteen (18). We reserve the right to request proof of age at any stage so that we can verify that minors under the age of eighteen (18) are not using the App. In the event that it comes to our knowledge that a person under the age of eighteen (18) is using the App, we will prohibit and block such User from accessing the App and will make all efforts to promptly delete any Personal Information (as such term is defined in our Privacy Policy) with regard to such User.
23. General
(a) These Terms constitute the entire terms and conditions between you and Orbs relating to the subject matter herein and supersedes any and all prior or contemporaneous written or oral agreements or understandings between you and Orbs, (b) any claim relating to the App and/or the use of the App and/or the Content contained therein will be governed by and interpreted in accordance with the laws of the State of Israel without reference to its conflict-of-laws principles, (c) any dispute arising out of or related to the App will be brought in, and you hereby consent to exclusive jurisdiction and venue of, the competent courts of the Tel-Aviv-Jaffa District, Israel, provided, however, that nothing herein shall be deemed to preclude Orbs from bringing any suit, enforcing any right or taking other legal action in your local jurisdiction. You agree to waive all defenses of lack of personal jurisdiction and forum non-convenience and agree that process may be served in a manner authorized by applicable law or court rule. Notwithstanding the foregoing, Orbs may seek injunctive relief in any court of competent jurisdiction anywhere on the world, (d) these Terms do not, and shall not be construed to create any relationship, partnership, joint venture, employer-employee, agency, or franchisor-franchisee relationship between the parties hereto, (e) no waiver by either party of any breach or default hereunder will be deemed to be a waiver of any preceding or subsequent breach or default. Any heading, caption or section title contained herein is inserted only as a matter of convenience, and in no way defines or explains any section or provision hereof, (f) YOU ACKNOWLEDGE AND AGREE THAT ANY CAUSE OF ACTION THAT YOU MAY HAVE ARISING OUT OF OR RELATED TO THE APP AND/OR THE SERVICE MUST BE FILED WITHIN ONE (1) YEAR AFTER SUCH CLAIM AROSE. OTHERWISE, SUCH CAUSE OF ACTION IS PERMANENTLY BARRED, (g) if any provision hereof is adjudged by any court of competent jurisdiction to be unenforceable, that provision shall be limited or eliminated to the minimum extent necessary so that these Terms shall otherwise remain in full force and effect while most nearly adhering to the intent expressed herein, (h) you may not assign or transfer these Terms (including all rights and obligations hereunder) without our prior written consent and any attempt to do so in violation of the foregoing shall be void. We may assign or transfer these Terms without restriction or notification, (i) no amendment hereof will be binding unless in writing and signed by Orbs, and (j) the parties agree that all correspondence relating to these Terms shall be written in the English language.
24. Information, questions or notification of errors:
If you have any questions (or comments) concerning the Terms, you are most welcome to send us an e-mail to the following address and we will make an effort to reply within a reasonable timeframe : hello@orbs.com.
"

"Orbs POS Wallet for Mobile Privacy Policy
Last Revised: January 31, 2020
Orbs Ltd. and its affiliates (“Orbs”, “we” or “us”) respect the privacy of users (“User” or “you”) of the My Orbs Wallet application (the “App”) and available and related services and are committed to protecting the personal information that their Users share with us. We believe that you have a right to know our practices regarding the information we may collect and use when you visit and/or use our Site. Capitalized terms which are not defined herein, shall have the meaning ascribed to them in our Terms of Use at [About - Terms of Use] (“TOU”), into which this Privacy Policy is incorporated by reference. This Privacy Policy and the ToU into which this Privacy Policy is incorporated relate solely to the App and its use. Use of the Orbs decentralized network platform and any activity thereon is subject to the Orbs Network Terms of Use which are available at [https://www.orbs.com/terms-of-use/].
1. Your Consent (PLEASE READ CAREFULLY!)
BY ENTERING, CONNECTING TO, ACCESSING OR USING THE APP, YOU AGREE TO THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS SET FORTH IN THIS PRIVACY POLICY (THE “PRIVACY POLICY”), INCLUDING TO THE COLLECTION, USE AND PROCESSING OF YOUR PERSONAL INFORMATION (AS DEFINED BELOW). IF YOU DISAGREE TO ANY TERM PROVIDED HEREIN, YOU MAY NOT ACCESS OR USE THE APP. FOR THE AVOIDANCE OF DOUBT, YOU HEREBY CONSENT TO THE COLLECTION, PROCESSING, TRANSFER AND USE OF YOUR PERSONAL INFORMATION. YOU ALSO ACKNOWLEDGE AND CONFIRM THAT YOU ARE NOT REQUIRED TO PROVIDE US WITH ANY PERSONAL INFORMATION AND THAT SUCH INFORMATION IS VOLUNTARILY PROVIDED TO US.
2. Which information we may collect on our Users?
We may collect two types of data and information from our Users: a. Non-identifiable and anonymous information (“Non-personal Information”). We are not aware of the identity of the User from whom we have collected the Non-personal Information. Non-Personal Information is any unconcealed information which does not enable identification of an individual User, and which is available to us while such User downloads, enters into and/or uses the App. Non-personal Information which may be gathered consists of technical information, and behavioral information, and may contain, among other things, the activity of the User on the App, type of operating system, User's transaction types or searches on the App, the device you use to access your account, including the hardware model, operating system and version type and version of browser, keyboard language, screen resolution, etc. Non-Personal Information which may be collected, will be collected in an aggregated form in order to allow us to evaluate and improve the performance of the App. b. Personally identifiable information (“Personal Information”). This information may identify an individual or may be of a private and/or sensitive nature. Orbs does not collect or store any of your Personal Information. However, the App is required to access and use certain of your Personal Information in order to allow you to utilize the functionality of the App to manage your holdings of Orbs Tokens and participate in the Orbs Proof-of-Stake Ecosystem. Certain of the Personal Information required for the App’s functionality is stored on your device, in the local storage folder associated with the App. Such Personal Information is loaded to your local storage folder automatically when you download the App and associate it with your Samsung Blockchain Infrastructure or Ledger HW wallet account. This category of Personal Information may include, inter alia: ● Wallet addresses on the Ethereum blockchain in which you hold your Orbs Tokens, which you may manually enter once the App is downloaded, in order to monitor such wallet addresses, without the ability to engage in any transactions (“Read Only Wallet Address”). ● Wallet addresses on the Ethereum blockchain in which you hold your Orbs Tokens that are associated with your Samsung Blockchain Infrastructure or Ledger HW wallet account, which will be automatically saved in the App’s designated storage folder on your device (“Orbs POS Wallet for Mobile Address”). ● A name for your Orbs POS Wallet for Mobile that you will select and input to the App. ● Your preferred setting for “gas” fees to allow for processing on the Ethereum blockchain of any transaction that you initiate through the App. ● A “Seedhash” generated by your Samsung Blockchain Infrastructure or Ledger HW wallet account. ● A wallet address on the Ethereum blockchain in which you hold your Orbs Tokens, which you will manually enter once the App is downloaded. The App may also access and use information, including certain information that may qualify as Personal Information, that has been stored on a public blockchain network like the Ethereum Blockchain or the Orbs Network. Such information will be accessed by the App from the applicable blockchain network in real-time when necessary for the functionality of the App, but will not be stored on your device or otherwise by Orbs. Such information may include: ● The balance of Orbs Tokens held in any Read Only Wallet Address or any Orbs POS Wallet for Mobile Address. ● The history of delegation to Guardians of the Orbs Tokens held in any Read Only Wallet Address or any Orbs POS Wallet for Mobile Address. ● The history of rewards distributed to any Read Only Wallet Address or any Orbs POS Wallet for Mobile Address as a result of participation in the Orbs Proof-of-Stake Ecosystem. ● Other transaction information effected by you or other participants in the Orbs Network or the Ethereum blockchain. For the avoidance of doubt, any Non-Personal Information that may be connected or linked to any Personal Information shall be deemed as Personal Information as long as such connection or linkage exists. We do not collect any Personal Information from you or related to you without your approval, which is obtained, inter alia, through your active acceptance to the TOU and the Privacy Policy. Orbs does not store any of your Personal Information. Any Personal Information used by the App is stored on your own device or on a public blockchain network, as applicable. Please note that third parties, such as Samsung or nodes and other participants in the Orbs Network or the Ethereum Blockchain, may collect, record and store certain Personal Information as a result of your use of the App, as described in further detail in Section 6.
3. How Do We Collect Information on Our Users?
There are a few methods that we may use: a. We collect information through your entry and use of the App. In other words, when you download or are using the App we are aware of it and may gather, collect and store the information relating to such usage. b. We collect information which you decide to provide us voluntarily. For example, we collect Personal Information and store such Personal Information on your device when you download the App and elect to enter a Read Only Wallet Address or link the App to the Samsung Blockchain Infrastructure or Ledger HW wallet. c. We utilize information which is stored on public blockchain networks like the Ethereum Blockchain and the Orbs Network. We may gather, collect and store such information either independently or through the help of our authorized third-party service providers as detailed below.
4. What are the Purposes of the Collection of Information?
Non-personal Information may be collected in order to: ● Use it for statistical and research purposes and for customization and improvement of our App and services; ● Enhance the User's experience while using the App; ● for business development purposes such as statistical and marketing analysis, systems testing, maintenance and development, customer surveys or to help us in any future dealings with you, for example by identifying your requirements and preference; ● to comply with any legal or regulatory requirements; ● to protect the safety and well being of yourself and/or other customers; and ● for all other purposes ancillary to any of the purposes stated above. Personal Information is collected and used in order to: ● to permit you to utilize all functionality of the App, including monitoring your holdings of Orbs Tokens and participating in the Orbs Proof-of-Stake Ecosystem; ● for all other purposes ancillary to any of the purposes stated above. "

" 5. Sharing Information with Third Parties
Orbs will not share any Personal Information it may collect with any third party, other than in the following circumstances: (a) to satisfy any applicable law, regulation, legal process, subpoena or governmental request; (b) to enforce this Privacy Policy and/or the TOU, including investigation of potential violations thereof; (c) to detect, prevent, or otherwise address fraud, security or technical issues; (d) to respond to claims that contact information (e.g. name, e-mail address, etc.) of a third-party has been posted or transmitted without their consent or as a form of harassment; (e) to protect the rights, property, or personal safety of Orbs, its Users or the general public; (f) by virtue of undergoing any change in control, including by means of merger, acquisition or purchase of all or substantially all of the assets of Orbs, so long as such acquirer maintains the same privacy terms hereunder; or (g) pursuant to your explicit approval prior to the disclosure. Note, that we may collect, hold and/or manage Personal Information through Orbs' authorized third parties vendors of certain products or services (such as, hosting cloud services) or through (including, as applicable, their affiliates) solely and limited to providing us with such requested services, and not for any other purposes. Such vendors may be located in a country that does not have the same data protection laws as your jurisdiction. For avoidance of doubt, Orbs may use Non-personal Information and transfer and disclose it to third parties at its discretion.
6. Information Collected By Third Parties
The App is designed as a plug in/extension to the Samsung Blockchain Infrastructure or Ledger HW wallet and connects to the Samsung Blockchain Infrastructure or Ledger HW wallet in order to allow for its functionality, which includes taking actions on the Orbs Blockchain Network and the Ethereum Blockchain. The Samsung Blockchain Infrastructure or Ledger HW wallet is a third-party application that is not under the control of Orbs and Orbs has no control over any actions or omissions of Samsung. Samsung may, pursuant to the terms and conditions applicable to the Samsung Blockchain Infrastructure or Ledger HW wallet and any other documents governing your use of Samsung’s services, including, without limitation, collect Non-Personal Information or Personal Information from you. You acknowledge and agree that Orbs has no control over, and no duty to take any action regarding, any collection of Non-Personal Information or Personal Information from you by Samsung. You should review the terms of use, privacy policy and any other applicable terms of your device and the Samsung Blockchain Infrastructure or Ledger HW wallet, which are available through Samsung’s website, within your device or by such other medium as may be provided by Samsung from time to time. The Orbs Network and Ethereum Blockchain are public blockchains that are each operated by a decentralized network of participants. In the case of the Orbs Network, such participants are known as Validators and Guardians and in the case of the Ethereum blockchain, such participants are validator nodes known as miners. If you engage in any transactions with respect to Orbs Tokens through the App, the results of such actions will be recorded by such decentralized networks of participants. Public block chains are distributed ledgers, intended to immutably record transactions across wide networks of computer systems. Many block chains are open to forensic analysis which can lead to deanonymization and the unintentional revelation of private financial information, especially when block chain data is combined with other data. Because these blockchains are decentralized or third-party networks that are not controlled or operated by Orbs or its affiliates, we are not able to erase, modify, or alter Personal Information from such networks.
7. Deletion of Personal Information
In any event, if for any reason you (or any person) wish to delete your Personal Information, please uninstall the App from your device. Upon uninstalling the App, all Personal Information stored in the designated local storage folder associated with the App on your device will be automatically deleted. Note that unless otherwise explicitly specified herein and/or unless you instruct us otherwise we may retain your Personal Information for as long as reasonably required for the purposes of which such Personal Information was collected, all as permitted under any applicable privacy laws. Aggregated and/or anonymous information derived from your use of the Site may remain on our servers indefinitely. Deletion or modification of any information stored by Samsung is subject to Samsung’s privacy policy and any other applicable terms. As set forth in Section 6, we are unable to erase, modify or alter any information stored on the Ethereum Blockchain or the Orbs Network.
8. Minors
The App is intended for Users over the age of eighteen (18). Therefore, Orbs does not intend and does not knowingly collect Personal Information from children under this age. We reserve the right to request proof of age at any stage so that we can verify that minors under this age are not using the App.
9. Security
We take reasonable measures to maintain the security and integrity of the App and prevent unauthorized access to it or use thereof through generally accepted industry standard technologies and internal procedures. Any Personal Information used by Orbs is stored on your device, which we believe provides advanced strict security standards (both physical and logical), or on public blockchain networks that employ highly secure design and implementation using encryption and architectures mechanisms. Please note, however, that there are inherent risks in transmission of information over the Internet or other methods of electronic storage and we cannot guarantee that unauthorized access or use will never occur. ORBS SHALL NOT BE RESPONSIBLE OR LIABLE FOR UNAUTHORIZED ACCESS, HACKING, OR OTHER SECURITY INTRUSIONS OR FAILURE TO STORE OR THE THEFT, DELETION, CORRUPTION, DESTRUCTION, DAMAGE, OR LOSS OF ANY DATA OR INFORMATION.
10. Third Party Service Providers
While providing the App we may use third party service providers, who may collect, store and/or process the information detailed herein. Orbs uses commercially reasonable efforts to engage with third parties that post a privacy policy governing their collection, processing and use of non-personal and personal information.
11. Cookies and Other Tracking Technologies.
When you access or use the App, we or our third party service providers may use industry-wide technologies such as “cookies” or other similar technologies which store certain information on your computer or device (“Cookies”), which will allow us to enable automatic activation of certain features and make your experience much more convenient and effortless. We or our authorized third party service providers may use both session cookies (which expire once you close the Site) and persistent cookies (which stay on your system until you delete them). It is easy to disable or delete Cookies. Most browsers will allow?you?to erase cookies from your computer's hard drive, block acceptance of cookies, or receive a warning before a cookie is stored. However, if?you?disable or erase cookies, your online experience may be limited. Cookies usually store only a Non-personal Information, such as the web pages you have visited, the duration of your browsing, etc. Orbs does not control such third party service providers.
12. International Data Transfer
In the course of your use of the App, information collected about you, including Personal Information, may be transferred to affiliated entities of Orbs or Samsung, to other third party service providers or to participants in a public blockchain (as provided herein) across borders and from your country or jurisdiction to other countries or jurisdictions around the world. Please note that such information may be transferred to a country and jurisdiction that does not have the same data protection laws as your jurisdiction, and you consent to such transfer of information.
13. Changes to the Privacy Policy
The terms of this Privacy Policy will govern the use of the App and any information collected therein. Orbs reserves the right to change this policy at any time, so please re-visit this page frequently. We will provide notice of substantial changes of this policy on the introductory page of the App on the Samsung Galaxy Store. Such substantial changes will take effect seven (7) days after such notice was provided on the App. Otherwise, all other changes to this Privacy Policy are effective as of the stated “Last Revised” date and your continued use of the App after the Last Revised date will constitute acceptance of, and agreement to be bound by, those changes. In the event that the Terms should be amended to comply with any legal requirements, the amendments may take effect immediately, or as required by law and without any prior notice.
14. Questions and Complaints.
If you have any questions (or comments) concerning this Privacy Policy, you are most welcome to send us an email to the following address: [hello@orbs.com]. "
